mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MGT_ORDERS(PURCHASER, STATUS, WAREHOUSE_ID) VALUES (#{purchaser}, #{status}, #{warehouseId})
mapper.update: UPDATE MGT_ORDERS SET STATUS = #{status.name()} WHERE ID = #{orderId}
UPDATE MGT_ORDERS SET STATUS = 'CANCEL' WHERE ID = #{orderId}
mapper.delete: UPDATE MGT_ORDERS SET STATUS = #{status} WHERE ID = #{num}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MGT_ORDERS WHERE STATUS != 'DELIVERED' AND CREATED_AT BETWEEN #{date} AND #{date}+0.999999999

SELECT id, purchaser, status, created_at as createdAt, warehouse_id as warehouseId
FROM MGT_ORDERS
